objects.text:
• 18K GOLD-PLATED CURVED DESIGN
• DOUBLE ROW PEARL EMBELLISHMENTS
• UNIQUE WAVE-SHAPED SILHOUETTE
• VERSATILE FOR ALL OCCASIONS

product_details.name: Luxe Pearl & Gold Wave Hoop Earrings - Timeless Elegance Collection
product_details.description:
• Premium 18K gold-plated curved design for sophisticated style
• Double row of exquisite pearl embellishments
• Unique wave-shaped silhouette for modern sophistication
• Comfortable clip-on mechanism for secure wear
• Perfect blend of classic pearls and contemporary design
• Elegant mirror finish on gold surfaces
• Versatile size suitable for both casual and formal occasions
• Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear
• High-quality craftsmanship with attention to detail
• Comes in a luxurious gift box perfect for special occasions

banner_details:
This visually rich e-commerce banner is divided into four quadrants with alternating color blocks, creating an eye-catching contrast. The upper left quadrant houses two elegant headline text layers ("heading_1" and "heading_2") in serif fonts, denoting the luxury and sophistication of the product. Just beneath them, a smaller tagline ("tagline") adds a subtle brand message. The lower left quadrant presents a list-style product feature section ("description"), followed by a bold price tag ("price") and a clear, rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_background" and "cta"). The right half prominently displays the product image ("product_image"), with decorative white dots for balance and visual flair.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Maroon: `#8A1538`
- Rich Gold: `#D4AF37`
- Soft Cream: `#F5F1E6`
- Bright White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases elegant gold earrings accented with clusters of polished white pearls. The primary color palette that can be used for an advertisement banner includes Metallic Gold (#D4AF37), Pearl White (#F8F8FF), Warm Champagne (#F3E5AB), and Shadow Gray (#A9A9A9) for contrast. The gold base exudes luxury and warmth, artfully highlighted by the subtle sheen and curved surface. Pearls are arranged in structured rows, creating texture and complementing the sleek gold. The reflective surface blends highlights and shadows, intensifying the luminosity. These colors harmonize beautifully, symbolizing opulence and sophistication, ideal for a luxury-themed promotional banner.
